item.title: Zafferano @ Ocean Financial Centre Singapore
item.description: Located on the top floor of the Ocean Financial Centre, Zafferano serves up classic Italian dishes using modern techniques and contemporary flavours. Guests are greeted with breath-taking skyline view overlooking the Singapore CBD and Marina Bay areas, perfect for romantic dates or special occasions. Dinner started off with Amuse Bouche which consists of a variety of bite-sized canapes from the kitchen. First up, Scampi e Fegato d’oca - charcoal grilled langoustine on top of aged foie gras drizzled with kombu and ginger dashi.
